title: Handwashing: Automatic Soap Dispenser — Gesture-activated (Project POCKIT)

media:group.media:title: Handwashing: Automatic Soap Dispenser — Gesture-activated (Project POCKIT)
media:group.media:description:
More details + signup at https://pockit.ai
Join the discussion at https://facebook.com/groups/pockit
This video shows the use of POCKIT blocks (together with some LEGO blocks) to build a smart handwashing soap dispenser that gets activated by hand presence, and then plays music + an LED-matrix-animation for a pre-set amount of time.
